entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
